hero.sub: From prototype to production in regulated enterprises — governance, observability, and cost under control.

demos.title: Prototype Demos
demos.sub: Watch how I turn ideas into working AI prototypes in days, not months.

services_teaser.title: How I Help
services_teaser.sub: From strategy to shipping — I help teams move fast with AI.

services.page_sub: Focused engagements designed to move fast and deliver measurable outcomes.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.best_for: Best for: strategy clarity, architecture review, build-or-buy decisions
consulting.deliverables: AI strategy assessment, architecture blueprint, vendor evaluation, risk & governance framework, executive readout.
consulting.desc: I help leadership teams cut through AI hype and make confident, informed decisions. Expect a clear roadmap, not a slide deck.

prototyping.title: Rapid Prototyping
prototyping.best_for: Best for: proving value fast, de-risking before committing headcount
prototyping.deliverables: Working prototype, evaluation suite, cost model, handoff documentation, demo recording.
prototyping.desc: I build production-grade prototypes that prove what's possible — and what isn't. Your team inherits clean code and clear documentation.

training.title: Enablement & Training
training.best_for: Best for: upskilling engineering teams, internal AI champions
training.deliverables: Custom workshop, hands-on labs, reference materials, follow-up Q&A session.
training.desc: I run intensive, hands-on workshops tailored to your team's stack and skill level. No generic content — everything is built around your real problems.

work.page_sub: Case studies from regulated enterprises and global financial institutions.

cases.title: CathayGPT — Enterprise GenAI Platform
cases.problem: The bank needed its first production GenAI application for internal knowledge and task assistance, with enterprise-grade security and compliance.
cases.approach: Architected and shipped a scalable serverless GenAI stack on GCP (Cloud Run, Cloud SQL, Vertex AI) with enterprise controls across identity, access, auditing, monitoring, and failure handling.
cases.outcome: CathayGPT (國泰智多星) became the bank's first production GenAI app. Drove internal ROI via knowledge & task assistance across the organization.
cases.owned: Lead developer / architect, end-to-end platform engineering, security & compliance, stakeholder alignment

cases.title: Overseas AI Agent Platform
cases.problem: The holding company needed a scalable AI Agent platform for overseas operations, supporting multiple scenarios with production operational standards.
cases.approach: Founded and built the first overseas-dedicated AI Agent platform with modular multi-agent architecture (agents/tools/memory/evaluation), MCP-style tool servers, and OAuth-based authentication patterns.
cases.outcome: Platform designed to scale across scenarios with standardized tool contracts for reuse and measurable evaluation loops.
cases.owned: Founding builder, architecture, agentic workflows, tool server design, evaluation framework

cases.title: Narrator — GenAI Risk Analytics
cases.problem: Risk analytics outputs were complex and inaccessible to non-technical stakeholders, limiting adoption.
cases.approach: Built and integrated a GenAI module (Narrator) that transforms risk analytics outputs into natural language; partnered with client engineering for a deployable PoC.
cases.outcome: Delivered adoption-ready demo. Translated business goals into implementable AI/analytics patterns and governance controls.
cases.owned: GenAI module development, technical discovery, client enablement, execution roadmap

cases.title: Production Automation & ML Enablement
cases.problem: Remote operations during COVID needed automation; engineering teams lacked applied ML literacy.
cases.approach: Shipped production-grade Python automation (Linux + MySQL + SHA-256) scaled as reusable templates across 70+ reporting workflows. Led ML enablement program (AWS DeepRacer) for 200 staff.
cases.outcome: Automation enabled full remote operations during COVID. ML literacy improved across engineering and business teams.
cases.owned: Automation engineering, call center platform delivery, ML training program, code review coordination

about.bio: I'm Nils (劉岦崱) — a GenAI Solution Architect and builder at Cathay United Bank, one of Taiwan's largest banks. I architect and ship production GenAI systems in regulated environments. Previously, I consulted at Synpulse (global financial services consulting) and served as a Management Associate at DBS Bank. I follow a Software 3.0 / generalization-first approach: reusable capabilities, standardized interfaces, and measurable evaluation loops over one-off prompt customization.

principles.title: The Bitter Lesson
principles.desc: Scale and compute win. I build systems that leverage foundation models rather than fight them.

principles.title: Platform-First
principles.desc: One-off solutions don't survive. I design for reuse, governance, and team autonomy from day one.

principles.title: Evaluation-Driven
principles.desc: If you can't measure it, you can't ship it. Rigorous evaluation is the foundation of every project I touch.
